welcome2: Everything you need to start exercising in a proper way
sec1_desc: Dive in and become the best version of yourself
sec3: Let us do the monitoring part
sec3_desc: Our AI will watch over you, count your reps and make sure you are doing exercises correctly. We count only reps that we find acceptable, which will stop you from cheating and improve your health. This time for real.
sec4_desc: It's like having a personal trainer you can take everywhere with yourself, any time, any place with no cost! Like exercising before going to bed, or perhaps you are one of those early birds that can't wait for their trainer, we got you.
sec5_desc: Love coding? Want to make your own training program? You can make your very own AI to track custom exercises you coded yourself.
name: Name
add_exercise_desc:
• Name can have maximum 20 charcters •
• Difficulty can be 1, 2 or 3 •
• You can use URL or base64 string for image •

user406: Password can't be longer than 24 characters
user407: Password must have at least 8 characters containing one: upper case, lower case, number and special character (!@#$%^&*)

user411: Week goal can be from 1 to 7
